targets.rawSql:
SELECT a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO",
    	e.cedula::Text "CEDULA",
    	e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
    	e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO",
    	b.nombre::Text "ESTADO",
    	c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO",
    	d.nombre::Text "PARROQ",
    	a.direccion::Text "DIR",
    	a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
	  	f.name::Text "CATEGORIA",
	  	g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",
	  	case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
		i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
		to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY  hh:mm:ss')::Text "FECHA",
		--to_char(h.fecha_registro,'dd-mm-YY hh:mm:ss') as "FECHA ESTATUS",
       case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
		k.nombre::Text "RESPONSABLE"
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            left JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
      where  j.id_resolutorio in (369)
      and j.principal is true
      and a.id_estatus in (3,4,8)

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS
LISTADO DE CASOS  DE EDUCACION UNIVERSITARIA EN LA BASE DE DATOS

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre::Text "ESTADOS",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "RECIBIDO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ASIGNADO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (4,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "EN PROCESO",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND ((a.feedback < 2 and a.verificado is null) or (a.feedback is null and a.verificado is null)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "POR CONFIRMAR",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ATENDIDO", --, count(a.id) as "TOTAL"
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3) and  e.id_resolutorio in (561) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2) AS "% EFECTIVIDAD %"
from gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio z on z.id =  e.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
where a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3) 
and b.id < 25 and  e.id_resolutorio in (369)
and e.principal is true --and z.nombre in ($gobernaciones)
group by b.nombre
HAVING count(*) > 1
order by "% EFECTIVIDAD %" desc

panels.title: REPORTE GENERAL DE LOS CASOS DE EDUCACION UNIVERSITARIA

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (15)
    and a.id_origen in (1)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (15)
    and a.id_origen in (1)
    and a.id_estatus in (5)

-- Casos Recibidos
SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (15)
    and a.id_origen in (2)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (15)
    and a.id_origen in (2)

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (15)
    and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (369)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (369)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (369)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and a.verificado is null 
and (a.feedback < 3 or a.feedback is null)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (369)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
                                           FROM gestion.caso a
                                           inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                           where b.id_resolutorio in (369)
                                           and b.principal is true
                                           and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))::decimal,2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
where b.id_resolutorio in (369)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

select to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YYYY') as fecham, to_char(a.fecha, 'mm-dd') as fechaa, count(a.fecha) as total
				from gestion.caso a
				inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
				inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
				where a.fecha > CAST(now()::timestamp AS DATE) - CAST('15 days' AS INTERVAL) and a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and a.id_estatus in (3,4,8) and j.id_resolutorio in (369)
				group by fecham, fechaa
				order by fechaa

panels.title: HISTÓRICO DE CASOS RECIBIDO EN EL SISTEMA DESDE LA VENAPP (ÚLTIMOS DÍAS)

targets.rawSql:
select 
						b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
						from gestion.caso a
						inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
						inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
						where  a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and j.id_resolutorio in (369)
						group by estado
						order by total desc
						Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS EN EL SISTEMA

targets.rawSql:
-- Total de Casos por Estado
select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
						from gestion.caso a
						inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
						inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
						where  a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and a.id_estatus in (6) and j.id_resolutorio in (369)
						group by estado
						order by total desc
						Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS ATENDIDOS

targets.rawSql:
select count(a.id) as TOTAL
	from gestion.caso a
	  inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
	  where a.id_sub_categoria in (15) 
	        and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
		      and c.id_resolutorio in (369)

select count(*) as TOTAL
                from gestion.caso a
				inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = a.id
            where a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and 
                a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8)
				        and a.id_extra_categoria is not null
				        and d.id_resolutorio in (369)

select count(*) as TOTAL
      from gestion.caso a 
					inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
      where a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and 
            a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8) and a.id_extra_categoria is null
				    and b.id_resolutorio in (369)

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
           inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria 
				   inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
           LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria   
           where a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and 
			     a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8) 
			     and b.id_resolutorio in (369)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

SELECT i.nombre as estatus, count(a.id) as subtotal,
            (SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
    					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
    					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula 
    					inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
    			 		inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
    					where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8) 
    					and c.id_resolutorio in (369))::Text "Total"
      FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula 
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			      inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
         where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,8) 
		 and c.id_resolutorio in (369)
         group by estatus

SELECT count(a.id)
            FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            where a.id_estatus in (3,4,6) and a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and j.id_resolutorio in (369)

-- Casos Recibidos
       SELECT count(a.id)
            FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            --inner JOIN  public.user b ON b.id = h.id_user_reg
            where a.id_estatus in (3,4) and a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and j.id_resolutorio in (369)

SELECT count(a.id)
            FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            --inner JOIN  public.user b ON b.id = h.id_user_reg
            where a.id_estatus in (6) and a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and j.id_resolutorio in (561)

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
                --inner JOIN  public.user b ON b.id = d.id_user_reg
                inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
                inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
                LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria               
            where c.id in (15)
               and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and j.id_resolutorio in (369)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
                inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
                inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
                LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria               
            where c.id in (15)
               and a.id_estatus in (6) and j.id_resolutorio in (369)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
               from gestion.caso a
	        inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
	        where  a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and k.id in (369)
            group by estado
            order by total desc
            Limit 10;

select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
            from gestion.caso a
	          inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
	        where  a.id_estatus in (6) and a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and k.id in (369)
            group by estado
            order by total desc
            Limit 10;

panels.title: REPORTE GENERAL CASO DE EDUCACION UNIVERSITARIA DE UBCH EN EL SISTEMA

targets.rawSql:
SELECT --DISTINCT ON (a.id) a.id::Text "CODIGO CASOS", 
    a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO", e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
	  e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
	  f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
    case when n.name is null then 'Sin Categ Adi' else n.name end::Text "CATEG ADI",
	  i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
	  to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY')::Text "FECHA",
    case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
    case when w.first_name is null then 'Analizando' else (w.first_name || ' ' || w.last_name ) end::Text "RESPONSABLE",
		w.phone::Text "TELF. RESP"
            FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
			      inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id and j.id_user is not null
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category n ON n.id = a.id_adicional_categoria
            where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8) and a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and j.id_resolutorio in (369) order by a.id desc;

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS
LISTADO DE CASOS  DE EDUCACION UNIVERSITARIA DE LA BASE DE DATOS (UBCH)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
    inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and k.id in (369)

panels.title: CASOS  EN PROCESO  DE EDUCACION UNIVERSITARIA

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
    inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and a.id_estatus in (6) and k.id in (369)

select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	   inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
       inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
       inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
	 where  a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and k.id in (369)
    group by estado
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: CASOS EN PROCESO POR ENT. FEDERALES

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	   inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
       inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
       inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
	 where  a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and a.id_estatus in (6) and k.id in (369)
    group by estado
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: REPORTE GENERAL DE EDUCACION UNIVERSITARIA POR ENTIDADES FEDERALES

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
            from gestion.caso a
	          inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
	        where  a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and k.id in (369)
            group by estado
            order by total desc
            Limit 10;

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS DE EDUCACION UNIVERSITARIA DE UBCH - ENT. FEDERALES (SERVICIOS PRIORIZADOS)

targets.rawSql:
select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
            from gestion.caso a
	          inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
	        where  a.id_estatus in (6) and a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and k.id in (369)
            group by estado
            order by total desc
            Limit 10;

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS DE EDUCACION UNIVERSITARIA ATENDIDOS DE  UBCH - ENT. FEDERALES (SERVICIOS PRIORIZADOS)
REPORTE DE CASOS DE EDUCACION UNIVERSITARIA DE UBCH RECIBIDOS-ATENDIDOS (POR ENTIDADES  FEDERALES)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (2) and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and k.id in (369)
    and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS DE EDUCACION UNIVERSITARIA POR MUN. CAPITALES

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and a.id_estatus in (6) and k.id in (369)
    and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS ATENDIDOS  - EDUCACION UNIVERSITARIA (MUN. CAPITALES)

targets.rawSql:
select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
       where a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and k.id in (369)
       and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
        group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: CASOS DE EDUCACION UNIVERSITARIA POR MUN. CAPITALES

targets.rawSql:
select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
       where a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and a.id_estatus in (6) and k.id in (369)
       and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
        group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS ATENDIDOS - EDUCACIÓN UNIVERSITARIA  (CD. IMPORTANTE)

targets.rawSql:
select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
       where a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and k.id in (369)
       and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166)

            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado

panels.title: REPORTE DE CASOS DE EDUCACION UNIVERSITARIA RECIBIDO-ATENDIDO DE OTROS MUNICIPIOS  (CIUDADES IMPORTANTES)

targets.rawSql:
select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "PARROQUIAS", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.parroquia c on c.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
     where a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and k.id in (369)
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc limit 50

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "PARROQUIAS", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.parroquia c on c.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
     where a.id_sub_categoria in (15) and a.id_estatus in (6) and k.id in (369)
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc limit 50
